results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reflection: True trust in God leads to guidance and direction in life.

results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
results.reason: Highlights the superiority of trusting in God over people.
results.reflection: Finding refuge in God is more secure than relying on flawed human beings.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: Shows the connection between trust in God and experiencing peace.
results.reflection: Trusting in God brings inner peace that surpasses understanding.

results.text: Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord, whose trust is the Lord.
results.reason: Emphasizes the blessings that come from trusting in God.
results.reflection: True blessings come to those whose trust is firmly placed in the Lord.

results.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
results.reason: Acknowledges turning to God in times of fear and uncertainty.
results.reflection: Trusting God dispels fear and brings comfort in the midst of challenges.
